name: shiny-stone
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Evolves a minccino into cinccino, a roselia into roserade, or a togetic into togekiss.
short_effect: Evolves a Minccino into Cinccino, a Roselia into Roserade, or a Togetic into Togekiss.

flavor_text.black_white: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It shines with a dazzling light.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It shines with a dazzling light.
